a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Change in global production of five materials used in the Simon-Ehrlich
Global mined production of the five materials included in the wager between Julian Simon and Paul Ehrlich in the 1980s.
Data source: United States Geological Survey (2024). National Minerals Information Center.
